modal.title: Change password
modal.twoFactorEnableHelp: When enabled, you will receive a 6-digit code by email every time you sign in.
modal.twoFactorDisableHelp: If disabled, you will sign in using only your password.

toast.passwordChangeRequested: We sent a confirmation link to your email.
toast.samePassword: The new password cannot be the same as the current password.
toast.weakPassword: The new password does not meet the minimum requirements.
toast.emailChangeRequested: We sent a confirmation link to your new email.
toast.emailChangeError: Failed to request the email change.
toast.emailInUse: This email is already in use.
toast.sameEmail: The new email cannot be the same as the current email.
toast.currentEmailMismatch: The current email does not match your account.
toast.emailMismatch: The email you entered does not match your account email.
